name: Referral Programs UI Kit
description:
For Coupons & Promotions UI Kit, go here.


Looking for ready designs for the best referral program experience in your store or application? Check out our 100% customizable UI kit with ready-to-use components based on the best practices for referral programs.


The UI Kit includes:


  • Editable Components Library
  • Referral Widgets
  • Customer Cockpit View
  • Referral Code Input Fields
  • Referral Sharing Views


Voucherify is an API-first Promotion Engine that allows marketers to run, share, and track personalized promotions, such as coupon offers, gift cards, referral, and loyalty programs like e-commerce giants do, but at a fraction of the cost.


Components are based on the best practices for referral programs. You can find them in our Referral Programs UX Guide.


If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at marketing@voucherify.io
